translationExplanation.message:
The integrated AI translation feature allows you to get an automatic translation of your transcribed text.
To do this:
  • Source language: select the language you speak into the microphone.
  • Target language: choose the language you want your text to be translated into.
These settings only affect translation, not transcription. If you disable automatic translation, your transcribed text will be in the language spoken into the microphone.

useBabelFishInstructions.message:
To use BabelFish AI:

1. Go to a website (for example, your webmail or a chat site of your favorite AI, like Le Chat by Mistral AI or ChatGPT).
2. Pin the extension icon for easy access.
3. Start/stop recording:
* Click the extension icon or use the keyboard shortcut.
* Speak into your microphone.
* Click the icon again or use the keyboard shortcut.
* The transcription will appear in the active text area or in a dialog box.

Keyboard shortcuts:
  • Windows: Ctrl+Shift+1
  • Mac: ⌘+Shift+1
